entry.title: It felt like an eternity (without you here, dad)
entry.summary:
Author: Nikiclix

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,825Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 40

Summary: Sequel to my other fic 'pull the lever' but can be read as a standalone :D Bruce wakes up as ghost after dying a traumatic death and has to watch his children fall apart without being able to touch, hear or see him. Cue him going to an old friend to make him tangible again and comfort his kids. I promise it's better when you actually read it, I'm shit at summaries...
